channel.title: Brendan Fraser on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Brendan Fraser on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Brendan Fraser’s ‘Rental Family,’ Directed by Hikari, Set for London Film Festival
item.description: The film follows an American actor who struggles to find purpose until he lands an unusual gig, working for a Japanese “rental family” agency, playing stand-in roles for strangers.

item.title: Brendan Fraser’s ‘Rental Family’ Sets BFI London Film Festival Gala
